DOCNAME: CASE OF MARIA MENYHART v. HUNGARY
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial
JUDGES: András Sajó;Françoise Tulkens;Kristina Pardalos;Nona Tsotsoria;Vladimiro Zagrebelsky
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in ORG .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the applicant 's husband brought an action against her before ORG , asking the court to dissolve their marriage and divide the matrimonial property . After holding several hearings and obtaining the opinion of an expert , ORG dissolved , in a partial decision , the applicant 's marriage on DATE .

CARDINAL . At the applicant 's request , the case was suspended DATE and DATE pending a related dispute . After holding numerous further hearings and obtaining the opinions of additional experts , the court divided the matrimonial property on DATE .
CARDINAL . NORP On appeal , on CARDINAL DATE the Veszprém County Regional Court partly changed the first - instance decision .
